TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XmlILStorageConverter extends System.Object
public ref class XmlILStorageConverter abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Represents an internal class that provides static helper methods that get a value converter from to convert among several physical common language runtime (CLR) representations for the same logical XML type.
